website_summaries.verdict: Haribo makes a fun alternative to peach rings.
pros: This bag of gummy peaches are soft, fresh, and chewy
Buyers say the flavor is actually reminiscent of sweet peaches!
They'll dissolve in your mouth, if you can resist gobbling them
cons: Sugar coating may shift to the bottom of the bag during shipment

customer_reviews.title: Trickery is NOT nice
customer_reviews.text: There was 4 seperate reg size bags in the package when i opened it. Not to mention...they r semi stale. So bummed. I could of paid $1 each n only spent $4. Especially since its food and NO sales tax. Well they got me...fooled me once. NEVER again.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy unless u will be home to accept
customer_reviews.text: Got a 1lb bag of melted goo. And it's not eligible for return.
customer_reviews.author: cassandra fitch

customer_reviews.title: Envelope problems.
customer_reviews.text: I got the package and they were all melted together. I ordered some other gummies in the same order, that arrived in a different package (insulated etc) and they were fine. I don’t. Like leaving one star reviews but I was really looking forward to these.
customer_reviews.author: Drew F

customer_reviews.title: Arrived fast, fresh, and full of peach flavor!
customer_reviews.text: Despite the negative reviews of the product arriving as a bag of melted goo, I took a chance, and luckily, that was not the case for me. The 1lb bag arrived double-bagged, so maybe that helped, since the outer bag being a silver metallic bubble wrap bag. I also live in the NorthEast and temperatures were mild when I received my delivery. These arrived so soft and flavorful and definitely satisfied my sweet tooth!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Kelly

customer_reviews.title: bag and the world will be a much better place.
customer_reviews.text: Uh, Gummi Peaches? How could it go wrong? Learned about these things while stationed in Germany and I haven't looked back. Just need to be made available in a large 5 or 8 lb. bag and the world will be a much better place.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Addicting
customer_reviews.text: Got tired of buying 2,3, OK can't lie 4 bags. Wanted them for my snack. Had a long layover in Amsterdam. Sad to say they never made it out the house. So peachy & sweet slight grain of sugar. Not too sweet, no chemical taste. Just like a peach from Georgia. (Dramatic I know)
customer_reviews.author: MythCalledLove

customer_reviews.title: A Peachy Product
customer_reviews.text: Got these for a gift to send to a kid and college and next thing I hear, he's the most popular kid on the floor. Apparently, these were a hit and made a lot of kids happy. Product was fresh and softer than the stale stuff I've bought at the local store. I'll be reordering these from Amazon from now on!
customer_reviews.author: West

customer_reviews.title: Go for the bigger bag
customer_reviews.text: I got the 5 lb bag for Christmas and it’s gone. So I decided to get the 1 lb so I wouldn’t eat as much/as fast. Well, it’s gone too. Just get the big one.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: This is my worse purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: They look much better in the picture. the ones I got i could have gotten at the dollar Tree and would have been better off.. They are all melted together can't even tell they were in rings at all. They are stuck to the package like glue can't get off its awwful.
customer_reviews.author: LaLaB

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: The flavor is authentic peach. They were delivered very fresh and soft. Couldn’t stop eating them.
customer_reviews.author: S. M. Akin

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Gummies
customer_reviews.text: Love these Haribo Gummy Peaches! Huge bag! Just wish it was resealable.
customer_reviews.author: Nala's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Love the flavor
customer_reviews.text: Love that it tastes just like a peach. The bag it comes in could use some improvements; like a Ziploc type seal, etc.. Other then that; I'm overall pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Stewart

customer_reviews.title: I love these peaches
customer_reviews.text: I love these peaches! I like them much better than the peach rings. Unfortunately I can't find these anymore in my grocery stores. but Amazon to the rescue! The bag arrived in good condition and the candy tastes soft and fresh. I wish the price were lower but I will probably order again.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Most of the time great
customer_reviews.text: Normally I love these. The wrapping should have taken into account of where the item was being shipped to . When I got it the candy was a soggy squishy mess
customer_reviews.author: Amzl cust

customer_reviews.title: Really good
customer_reviews.text: I need to order a bigger bag! I finished these in a few days and they’re amazing. Only complaint is that a lot of the sugar comes off and ends up at the bottom of the bag but that expected with shipping and stuff. They came in a clear plastic bag and weren’t stale or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Lee

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy, not fresh
customer_reviews.text: These seem very old. When I normally order the peaches are soft and flexible with great flavor. These peaches are hard and have a bad taste. I recommend buying from another seller, not a fresh product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These candied are heavy. So you may think you are getting much more candy than what you actually get
customer_reviews.text: The size of the product looks much smaller than the actual size on amazon. I wanted these for candy buffet for my daughter’s bridal shower and I can’t feed Much in the jars. They taste good though.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Soooo FRESH!
customer_reviews.text: The candy was fresh and besides the great flavor, they were super soft!
customer_reviews.author: Paula Sacto.

customer_reviews.title: Good Candy
customer_reviews.text: Mine came in perfect and tasted perfect too.. I came back to order some stuff for more. They weren’t stuck together either. Delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Starla K Flannery

customer_reviews.title: Haribo goodness
customer_reviews.text: Love these peach yummies. I used to buy similar product from a candy shop and was delighted to find these again. Great peach taste.
customer_reviews.author: June M

customer_reviews.title: Not full
customer_reviews.text: They are good for the price you pay, if the price was any higher it would be a rip off, not a full bag as stated
customer_reviews.author: Madison gadberry

customer_reviews.title: Melted gummy—Inedible 😳😭😡
customer_reviews.text: 4 bags delivered 21 July 20. All four bags melted to inedible mess by being left in 90 degree sun on front porch. I was unaware of delivery. If only delivery person would have rang the doorbell. 😳☹️😡
customer_reviews.author: Claire King

customer_reviews.title: delicious
customer_reviews.text: delicious, peachy, and sugary. it's exactly what I was craving
customer_reviews.author: Li

customer_reviews.title: Peach goooo
customer_reviews.text: Great ! Now we have a bag of melted peach goo
customer_reviews.author: Arin Smith

customer_reviews.title: Incredible smell
customer_reviews.text: When we cut open the bag, the peach aroma nearly knocked us off our feet! The scent is heavenly! The product is as described.
customer_reviews.author: e easley

customer_reviews.title: Seemed slightly stale
customer_reviews.text: Came in on time and tasted great, were a little tougher than some of the other peaches I've gotten but overall served their purpose and tasted fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jared H.

customer_reviews.title: yum
customer_reviews.text: came right around/in given time range for shipping. Surpirsingly not sticky/gooey/melty upon arrival considering the warm westher. They're good quality! favorite candy of mine..just had to buy :D
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Pricey
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite, but they were a little pricey....the 5lbs bag is a better deal.
customer_reviews.author: Aplus.

customer_reviews.title: Good gummies
customer_reviews.text: Great product, just like you would buy in the store.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Jin

customer_reviews.title: The Best Gummy Peaches I've Ever Had!
customer_reviews.text: These gummy peaches tasted way better than the Haribo gummy peaches I've purchased from the stores. They were soft and tasty.
customer_reviews.author: Gunslingerfire

customer_reviews.title: YUM!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived fresh and soft. Delicious! Highly recommend. Great gift item.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya McKinney

customer_reviews.title: YUMMY
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Very fresh and soft. I only wish I'd ordered more!
customer_reviews.author: inspiring4u2 metal art

customer_reviews.title: A must-buy for peach lovers
customer_reviews.text: These tasted fresh and were very soft without being melty.
customer_reviews.author: JGal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our cupcakes
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our peach themed baby shower. We decorated the cupcakes with these.
customer_reviews.author: Howard Osborne Sr

customer_reviews.title: Yum!
customer_reviews.text: These were really good. Not to sweet just the right amount of peach. I will definitely be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: LeLe

customer_reviews.title: So good
customer_reviews.text: Um, yes please! These aren't the easiest to find in stores.
customer_reviews.author: Em Raff

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: These we're really nasty. The only peach rings that I had that were this bad.
customer_reviews.author: richard

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t realize these came from overseas when I ordered them and they definitely did not look like what I was expecting. I actually threw the whole box in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these, I am addicted to eating them. Great peachy flavor.
customer_reviews.author: reader was Pam H

customer_reviews.title: Gummies were melted
customer_reviews.text: The gummies delivered melted!! Plus I thought the gummies were going to be in a ig 1lb bag not four individual packages. What a rip off.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Y.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best peach candies I have ever had!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Traynor

customer_reviews.title: Do not order in the summer.
customer_reviews.text: Completely melted when they arrived. Unusable. Keep in mind when ordering
customer_reviews.author: Jan Pfrenger

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! Can't find them where I live very often. Will be ordering a larger size very soon.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Always check to see if you are getting something new  or not
customer_reviews.text: I got LPN , make sure if you order this ask for a new bag ! What a rip off and gross
customer_reviews.author: J&A Chavez

customer_reviews.title: They were exactly what I expect. I would definitely order them again.
customer_reviews.text: They were exactly what I expect. I would definitely order them again.
customer_reviews.author: MARY Hall

customer_reviews.title: Knowing where I can get them.
customer_reviews.text: I love these, and since it's too hard to find,I'm glad to know I can get them from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl hutto

customer_reviews.title: Yummy! But $$$!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the candy but when I compared price to local store prices it was a little high. But otherwise happy.
customer_reviews.author: Nena

customer_reviews.title: Addictive
customer_reviews.text: Love these - came in a heavy foil pouch so they weren't at all stale. I'll be ordering the larger package next time.
customer_reviews.author: Jojo R

customer_reviews.title: may be that's not a good thing. 😛
customer_reviews.text: These are so addictive, may be that's not a good thing. 😛
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy in summer.
customer_reviews.text: Product was put in mailbox on very hot day and candy melted.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Neary

customer_reviews.title: Delivered fast and fresh
customer_reviews.text: These are very delicious treats and this qty is a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My OCD wife weighed it 15.1 ounces. Just sayin 6% short a product is worth a star..
customer_reviews.author: BucknastyDP

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Love this product but the candies were stuck together and old. Poorly packaged. Ended up throwing away...my kids wouldn't eat them even when they could finally pull 1 or 2 off the stuck together clump.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Addictingly sweet peaches
customer_reviews.text: addicting product.. if you like fresh peaches and want a candy that reminds you of sweet peaches, this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are delicious. We used to get this candy ...
customer_reviews.text: They are delicious. We used to get this candy when we lived in Norway and was so excited that I could order them. I will be ordering them again.
customer_reviews.author: Lara Mosier

product_meta.title: Haribo Peaches 1lb Sealed Bag
product_meta.description:
Size:1 Pound (Pack of 1)

Haribo Two-toned, sugar-dusted gummi peaches… flavor so natural, you'll think you just bitten into a fresh Georgia Peach!

 * Packed to Order in a Heat Sealed Cello bag for maximum Freshness

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
